name: MagpieCrossing
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD for Lucien, the orange haired boy. Q to dodge. E for basic attack. F for special attack, only possible when one of the orbs under your health bar is lit up. 

IJKL for Elio, the blue-eyed boy. U to dodge. O for basic attack. H for special.

Space bar will swap the active target during the King Eyeball's barrage attack, where one side is healed and the other faces a rain of stars.
